channel.title: CVE Feed for Codeer Limited -- Bricks Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-25600|2024-06-04T12:54:42.549Z -- Codeer Limited -- Bricks Builder
item.description: Improper Control of Generation of Code ('Code Injection') vulnerability in Codeer Limited Bricks Builder allows Code Injection.This issue affects Bricks Builder: from n/a through 1.9.6.
